lead_paragraph: Magnus Moan of Norway won a World Cup Nordic combined event in Trondheim, Norway. Bill Demong of the United States finished fourth. Moan edged Jason Lamy Chappuis of France by seven-tenths of a second in the 10-kilometer cross-country ski race, finishing in 24 minutes 49.6 seconds.
